web_snippets: Hans Wilhelm (born September 21, 1945) is a German-American writer, children's book author and illustrator, and artist. Hans Wilhelm has written and/or ...
Hans Wilhelm has written and illustrated over 220 books for children and adults. Many have been translated into more than thirty languages.
